purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the 44th International Conference on Conceptual Modeling (ER 2025), scheduled for October 20-23, 2025, in Poitiers, France. It invites contributions on the theme of 'Building Trust Through Conceptual Modeling,' emphasizing the importance of trust in digital ecosystems. The conference seeks original research submissions on various topics related to conceptual modeling, including traditional and emerging areas. Important deadlines for paper submissions and guidelines for the review process are provided, along with information about a post-conference special journal issue. The email also lists specific topics of interest for submissions.

infos:
Subject: [CFP] 44th International Conference on Conceptual Modeling (ER 2025)
